skills.desc: Removes all debuffs from all allies, then places a [Block Debuffs] buff and a [Shield] buff on all allies for 2 turns. The [Shield] buff is equal to 20% of this Champion's MAX HP.
skills.name: Scales of the Ages

skills.desc: Places a [Block Damage] buff on this Champion for 1 turn whenever their HP drops below 30%.
skills.name: Last Gasp [P]
